#### <s class="topic-title">[[ego]]</s>

From the [[Sanskrit]], [[Ahamkara]] - The sense of "I" or sense of [[self]] that we take on and articulate.

[should you commit ego death?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C0ofnCI6LF0)

**See**:: [[Ahamkara]], [[self]]
